#https://github.com/facebook/fbthrift/blob/master/ThriftLibrary.cmake lines 88 to 121
add_library(
  memcached

assoc.h
authfile.h
bipbuffer.h
cache.h
config.h
crawler.h
crc32c.h
extstore.h
hash.h
items.h
itoa_ljust.h
jenkins_hash.h
logger.h
memcached.h
murmur3_hash.h
protocol_binary.h
restart.h
sasl_defs.h
slab_automove.h
slab_automove_extstore.h
slabs.h
stats_prefix.h
storage.h
tls.h
trace.h
util.h
assoc.c
authfile.c
bipbuffer.c
cache.c
crawler.c
crc32c.c
daemon.c
extstore.c
globals.c
hash.c
items.c
itoa_ljust.c
jenkins_hash.c
logger.c
memcached.c
murmur3_hash.c
restart.c
sizes.c
slab_automove.c
slab_automove_extstore.c
slabs.c
stats_prefix.c
storage.c
thread.c
timedrun.c
tls.c
util.c
  )

target_link_libraries(
  memcached

  PUBLIC
  ${LIBEVENT_LIB}
  Threads::Threads
)
